entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Your retarded orange ass need to own you fucked up. Thousands dead. The last administration didnt leave equipment.  Lies. You had 3 years. You closed the pandemic department. Dumb ass liar. I hope you catch COVID-19 and die but no jail awaits you.
